abstract: Federated Media Publishing, the online blog ad network founded by John Battelle, has raised between $40 million in $50 million in Series C funding at a $200 million pre-money valuation, according to peHUB.
lead_paragraph: Federated Media Publishing, the online blog ad network founded by John Battelle, has raised between $40 million in $50 million in Series C funding at a $200 million pre-money valuation, according to peHUB.

headline.main: Federated Media Said to Score Funding
